mapper.select: select RESUME_NO, RESUME_TITLE, RESUME_PHOTO, RESUME_DATE, PORTF_FILE FROM USER_RESUME where USER_ID=#{userId} and RESUME_NO=#{resumeNo}
select RESUME_NO, RESUME_TITLE, RESUME_DATE, PORTF_FILE FROM USER_RESUME where USER_ID=#{USER_ID} order by RESUME_DATE desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_RESUME (RESUME_NO, RESUME_TITLE, RESUME_PHOTO, RESUME_DATE, USER_ID) VALUES(#{resumeNo}, #{resumeTitle}, #{resumePhoto},sysdate, #{userId})
mapper.update: update USERS set USER_NAME=#{USER_NAME} where USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.insert: insert into RESUME_HIGHSCHOOL(HIGH_EDU_NO, GED, HIGH_NAME, HIGH_DATE, HIGH_MAJOR) values (RESUME_HIGHSCHOOL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ged}, #{highName}, #{highDate}, #{highMajor})

insert into RESUME_UNIVERSITY(UNI_EDU_NO, UNI_ACT, UNI_CATEGORY, UNI_NAME, UNI_DATE, UNI_MAJOR, UNI_POINT) values (RESUME_UNIVERSITY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{uniAct}, #{uniCategory}, #{uniName}, #{uniDate}, #{uniMajor}, #{uniPoint})

insert into RESUME_GRADSCHOOL(GRAD_EDU_NO, GRAD_ACT, GRAD_NAME, GRAD_CATEGORY, GRAD_DATE, GRAD_MAJOR, GRAD_POINT) values (RESUME_GRADSCHOOL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{gradAct}, #{gradName}, #{gradCategory}, #{gradDate}, #{gradMajor}, #{gradPoint})

insert into RESUME_CAREER (CAR_NO, CAR_NAME, CAR_DATE, CAR_POSITION, CAR_DEPT, CAR_RESP, CAR_SALARY) values (RESUME_CAREER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{carName}, #{carDate}, #{carPosition}, #{carDept}, #{carResp}, #{carSalary})
insert into RESUME_CERTI (CERTI_NO, CERTI_NAME, CERTI_PUB, CERTI_DATE) values (RESUME_CERTI_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{certiName}, #{certiPub}, #{certiDate})
insert into RESUME_CL(CL_NO, CL_FILE, CL_GROWTH, CL_MOTIVE, CL_ADV, CL_ASP) values(RESUME_CL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{clFile}, #{clGrowth}, #{clMotive}, #{clAdv}, #{clAsp})
mapper.select: select CL_FILE, CL_GROWTH, CL_MOTIVE, CL_ADV, CL_ASP from RESUME_CL where CL_NO = #{clNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME_HIGH_INFO (RESUME_NO, HIGH_EDU_NO) SELECT NVL(Max(RESUME_NO), 1), #{highEduNo} FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
INSERT INTO RESUME_UNI_INFO (RESUME_NO, UNI_EDU_NO) SELECT NVL(Max(RESUME_NO), 1), #{uniEduNo} FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
INSERT INTO RESUME_GRAD_INFO (RESUME_NO, GRAD_EDU_NO) SELECT NVL(Max(RESUME_NO), 1), #{gradEduNo} FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESUME_UNI_INFO WHERE UNI_EDU_NO = #{uniEduNo} AND RESUME_NO = (SELECT NVL(Max(RESUME_NO), 1) FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
DELETE FROM RESUME_GRAD_INFO WHERE GRAD_EDU_NO = #{gradEduNo} AND RESUME_NO = (SELECT NVL(Max(RESUME_NO), 1) FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME_CAR_INFO (RESUME_NO, CAR_NO) SELECT NVL(Max(RESUME_NO), 1), #{carNo} FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESUME_CAR_INFO WHERE CAR_NO = #{carNo} AND RESUME_NO = (SELECT NVL(Max(RESUME_NO), 1) FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE RESUME_CAREER SET CAR_NAME = #{carName}, CAR_DATE = #{carDate}, CAR_POSITION = #{carPosition}, CAR_DEPT = #{carDept}, CAR_RESP = #{carResp}, CAR_SALARY = #{carSalary} WHERE CAR_NO = #{carNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME_CERTI_INFO (RESUME_NO, CERTI_NO) SELECT NVL(Max(RESUME_NO), 1), #{certiNo} FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESUME_CERTI_INFO WHERE CERTI_NO = #{certiNo} AND RESUME_NO = (SELECT NVL(Max(RESUME_NO), 1) FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME_CL_INFO (RESUME_NO, CL_NO) SELECT NVL(Max(RESUME_NO), 1), #{clNo} FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESUME_CL_INFO WHERE CL_NO = #{clNo} AND RESUME_NO = (SELECT NVL(Max(RESUME_NO), 1) FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT HIGH_EDU_NO FROM RESUME_HIGHSCHOOL WHERE HIGH_EDU_NO = (SELECT MAX(HIGH_EDU_NO) FROM RESUME_HIGHSCHOOL)
SELECT UNI_EDU_NO FROM RESUME_UNIVERSITY WHERE UNI_EDU_NO = (SELECT MAX(UNI_EDU_NO) FROM RESUME_UNIVERSITY)
SELECT GRAD_EDU_NO FROM RESUME_GRADSCHOOL WHERE GRAD_EDU_NO = (SELECT MAX(GRAD_EDU_NO) FROM RESUME_GRADSCHOOL)
SELECT CAR_NO FROM RESUME_CAREER WHERE CAR_NO = (SELECT MAX(CAR_NO) FROM RESUME_CAREER)
SELECT CERTI_NO FROM RESUME_CERTI WHERE CERTI_NO = (SELECT MAX(CERTI_NO) FROM RESUME_CERTI)
SELECT CL_NO FROM RESUME_CL WHERE CL_NO = (SELECT MAX(CL_NO) FROM RESUME_CL)

SELECT h.HIGH_EDU_NO AS highEduNo, h.GED AS ged, h.HIGH_NAME AS highName, h.HIGH_DATE AS highDate, h.HIGH_MAJOR AS highMajor FROM RESUME_HIGHSCHOOL h INNER JOIN RESUME_HIGH_INFO i ON h.HIGH_EDU_NO = i.HIGH_EDU_NO INNER JOIN USER_RESUME u ON i.RESUME_NO = u.RESUME_NO WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY h.HIGH_EDU_NO, h.GED, h.HIGH_NAME, h.HIGH_DATE, h.HIGH_MAJOR ORDER BY h.HIGH_DATE DESC

SELECT u.UNI_EDU_NO AS uniEduNo, u.UNI_ACT AS uniAct, u.UNI_CATEGORY AS uniCategory, u.UNI_NAME AS uniName, u.UNI_DATE AS uniDate, u.UNI_MAJOR AS uniMajor, u.UNI_POINT AS uniPoint FROM RESUME_UNIVERSITY u INNER JOIN RESUME_UNI_INFO i ON u.UNI_EDU_NO = i.UNI_EDU_NO INNER JOIN USER_RESUME u ON i.RESUME_NO = u.RESUME_NO WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY u.UNI_EDU_NO, u.UNI_ACT, u.UNI_CATEGORY, u.UNI_NAME, u.UNI_DATE, u.UNI_MAJOR, u.UNI_POINT ORDER BY u.UNI_DATE DESC

SELECT rg.GRAD_EDU_NO AS gradEduNo, rg.GRAD_ACT as gradAct, rg.GRAD_CATEGORY as gradCategory, rg.GRAD_NAME AS gradName, rg.GRAD_DATE AS gradDate, rg.GRAD_MAJOR AS gradMajor, rg.GRAD_POINT as gradPoint FROM RESUME_GRADSCHOOL rg INNER JOIN RESUME_GRAD_INFO i ON rg.GRAD_EDU_NO = i.GRAD_EDU_NO INNER JOIN USER_RESUME u ON i.RESUME_NO = u.RESUME_NO WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY rg.GRAD_EDU_NO, rg.GRAD_ACT, rg.GRAD_CATEGORY, rg.GRAD_NAME, rg.GRAD_DATE, rg.GRAD_MAJOR, rg.GRAD_POINT ORDER BY rg.GRAD_DATE DESC

SELECT rc.CAR_NO AS carNo, rc.CAR_NAME AS carName, rc.CAR_DATE AS carDate, rc.CAR_POSITION AS carPosition, rc.CAR_DEPT AS carDept, rc.CAR_RESP AS carResp, rc.CAR_SALARY AS carSalary FROM RESUME_CAREER rc INNER JOIN RESUME_CAR_INFO i ON rc.CAR_NO = i.CAR_NO INNER JOIN USER_RESUME u ON i.RESUME_NO = u.RESUME_NO WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY rc.CAR_NO, rc.CAR_NAME, rc.CAR_DATE, rc.CAR_POSITION, rc.CAR_DEPT, rc.CAR_RESP, rc.CAR_SALARY ORDER BY rc.CAR_DATE DESC

SELECT rc.CERTI_NO AS certiNo, rc.CERTI_NAME AS certiName, rc.CERTI_PUB AS certiPub, rc.CERTI_DATE AS certiDate FROM RESUME_CERTI RC INNER JOIN RESUME_CERTI_INFO i ON rc.CERTI_NO = i.CERTI_NO INNER JOIN USER_RESUME u ON i.RESUME_NO = u.RESUME_NO WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY rc.CERTI_NO, rc.CERTI_NAME, rc.CERTI_PUB, rc.CERTI_DATE ORDER BY rc.CERTI_DATE DESC

SELECT cl.CL_NO AS clNo, cl.CL_FILE AS clFile, cl.CL_GROWTH AS clGrowth, cl.CL_MOTIVE AS clMotive, cl.CL_ADV AS clAdv, cl.CL_ASP AS clAsp FROM RESUME_CL cl INNER JOIN RESUME_CL_INFO i on cl.CL_NO = i.CL_NO INNER JOIN USER_RESUME u on i.RESUME_NO = u.RESUME_NO WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY cl.CL_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RESUME_CL SET CL_File = NULL WHERE CL_File = #{fileName}
